import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Route, Switch, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import * as ROUTES from '../../constants/routes' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import * as actions from '../../backend/store/actions' import LandingPage from '../Landing' import SignUpPage from '../SignUp/index.js' import SignOut from '../SignOut' import Home from '../Home' import Menu from '../Menu' import PasswordChangePage from '../Profile/password_change.js' import ProfileChangePage from '../Profile/profile_change.js' import Restaurants from '../Restaurants' import About from '../About' import Toolbar from '../Navigation/Toolbar' import SideDrawer from '../SideDrawer/SideDrawer' import Backdrop from '../Backdrop/Backdrop' import Friends from '../Friends' import '../../stylesheets/Landing.css' import '../../stylesheets/SignUp.css' import '../../stylesheets/Restaurants.css' import '../../stylesheets/Menu.css' import '../../stylesheets/Home.css' import '../../stylesheets/SearchBar.css' import '../../stylesheets/Backdrop.css' import '../../stylesheets/DrawerToggleButton.css' import '../../stylesheets/SideDrawer.css' import '../../stylesheets/Toolbar.css' import '../../stylesheets/Loader.css' import '../../stylesheets/main-logo.css' import '../../stylesheets/titles.css' import '../../stylesheets/button.css' import '../../stylesheets/form.css' import '../../stylesheets/about.css' const close = useEffect(() => { return () => { cleanUp() } }, [cleanUp]) const App = ({ loggedIn, sideDrawerOpen }) => { let routes if (loggedIn) { routes = ( ) } else { routes = ( ) } return (
{backdrop}
{routes}
) } const mapStateToProps = ({ firebase }) => ({ loggedIn: firebase.auth.uid, sideDrawerOpen: false, }) const mapDispatchToProps = { openDrawer: actions.openSideDrawer, closeDrawer: actions.closeSideDrawer, } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(App)
